derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent. (in the sense 'old or decayed tree stump'): of unknown origin

entry.def: The runt of a group of animals born to the same mother at the same time is the smallest and weakest of them.

example.ex: Animals reject the runt of the litter.
example.tran: 动物会丢弃最弱小的幼仔。

entry.def: You call a small person a runt when you are annoyed with them and are expressing your dislike for them.

example.ex: My research owes nothing to anybody, least of all to a little runt like you.
example.tran: 我的研究不归功于任何人，尤其不会归功于像你这样的小矮子。
